entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 10:44 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
